name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Data Scientist / AI Engineer with 13+ years of experience in Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, and MLOps, specializing in building AI/ML-powered platforms with expertise in **Python**, **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, and **Docker**. Proficient in developing predictive analytics solutions and deploying cloud-native systems on **Azure**. Skilled in utilizing deep learning techniques, including **Deep Learning Frameworks** and **Natural Language Processing** for innovative problem-solving.
Strong in implementing **Continuous Integration** and **Continuous Deployment** practices while ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Adept at model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow** and **Airflow**. Well-versed in backend development with **RESTful web services** and source code version control, along with a strong foundation in **Unit Testing** and **Object-Oriented Programming**.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed and implemented **Machine Learning** models for risk scoring, fraud detection, and document classification using **Python**, **TensorFlow**, **PyTorch**, achieving performance metrics with over **90% accuracy**.
• Utilized **MLOps** methodologies with tools like **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Airflow**, ensuring streamlined model training and deployment pipelines across multiple environments, reducing deployment time by **30%**.
• Integrated **Natural Language Processing** features using libraries such as **spaCy** and **Hugging Face Transformers**, enhancing document parsing capabilities and anomaly detection through secure **RESTful web services**.
• Managed large-scale data using **SQL** databases and frameworks for **Big Data**, enabling real-time analytics and rapid data ingestion with an architecture capable of handling over **1 million transactions per minute**.
• Built and deployed microservices using **Docker** and orchestrated environments through **Kubernetes**, with an emphasis on fault-tolerant deployments and scalability.
• Established **Continuous Integration** and **Continuous Deployment** (CI/CD) practices with **GitHub Actions**, ensuring regular updates, efficient testing, and minimizing deployment failures to less than **5%**.
• Implemented advanced testing frameworks using **Unit Testing** strategies with tools like **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PyTest** to maintain high code quality and reliability, achieving over **95% test coverage**.
• Designed interactive data visualization tools using **D3.js**, **Chart.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, facilitating the analysis of financial trends and fraud activities, enhancing reporting capabilities significantly.
• Collaborated with multi-functional teams to continuously refine algorithms, utilizing **Deep Learning Frameworks** for advanced data processing and model inference.
• Ensured compliance with data security standards by integrating best practices and tools, managing sensitive information within the frameworks of regulatory standards.

Leveraged **Machine Learning** techniques to create and deploy models for fraud detection, employing **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, achieving a **90% accuracy rate** in identifying suspicious transactions.
Developed and optimized **ML pipelines** for real-time credit scoring and churn prediction utilizing **MLflow** and **Airflow**, reducing processing time by **30%** compared to previous methodologies.
Designed and implemented data ingestion strategies for financial data using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time data processing, enhancing data availability by **50%**.
Created interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**; improved user engagement and systems performance for financial tools and dashboards.
Engineered a comprehensive event-driven architecture integrating **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring robust asynchronous communication for critical workflows, thereby improving system responsiveness.
Modernized core systems by transitioning to a **microservices** architecture with **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, resulting in enhanced scalability and performance for high-volume transaction processing.
Delivered actionable insights through **real-time analytics dashboards** using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant transaction insights and anomaly detection capabilities.
Applied **Deep Learning** frameworks such as **TensorFlow** and **PyTorch** to improve model performance and enhance predictive capabilities in various applications, optimizing algorithm efficiency.
Utilized **Continuous Integration/Continuous Deployment (CI/CD)** processes and **Docker** for streamlined development and deployment workflows, facilitating rapid iterations and version control in software updates.

Utilized **Python** and **TensorFlow** to develop and optimize **Machine Learning** models and implement **Artificial Intelligence** solutions, focusing on enhancing predictive accuracy and performance metrics by over **30%**.
Executed **Deep Learning** algorithms and strategies for various applications including **Natural Language Processing** and **Computer Vision**, significantly improving data classification results by **25%** through refined model architecture.
Designed and implemented RESTful API services for model deployment using **Docker** and **gRPC**, facilitating efficient communication between services and enabling seamless integration.
Leveraged **SQL** for data extraction and manipulation, employing robust data handling techniques to ensure data quality and integrity in training datasets while reducing processing time by **40%**.
Implemented rigorous **Unit Testing** methodologies that improved codebase reliability and reduced defects post-release by **15%** through the use of **Continuous Integration** and **Continuous Deployment** practices.
Developed MLOps workflows on **Azure**, managing model lifecycle from development to deployment, achieving **90%** automation in model retraining and deployment processes.
Utilized version control systems for all projects, ensuring efficient collaboration and tracking of changes with a focus on code maintainability and scalability.
Engaged in ongoing research and development of emerging **Deep Learning Frameworks** such as **PyTorch** and **TensorFlow Lite** to stay at the forefront of technology advancements in AI and machine learning.
